com.craftar

Interface SearchController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CloudSearchController

    public interface SearchController
    Interface implemented by the ImageRecognition classes to manage the Single shot and Finder Mode searches.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onFinderActivated()
      Notify that CraftARGenericSDK.startFinder() was called.
      void onFinderDeactivated()
      Notify that CraftARGenericSDK.stopFinder() was called.
      void onPictureTaken(CraftARQueryImage image)
      Callback from the CraftARSDK.singleShotSearch() call, when the picture was taken.
      void onPreviewFrame(CraftARQueryImage image)
      Receives a frame from the camera.
      void onTakePictureFailed(CraftARError error)
      Callback from the CraftARSDK.singleShotSearch() call, when the picture could not be taken.

    • Method Detail

      • onPictureTaken

        void onPictureTaken(CraftARQueryImage image)
        Callback from the CraftARSDK.singleShotSearch() call, when the picture was taken.
        Parameters:
        image - The picture taken

      • onTakePictureFailed

        void onTakePictureFailed(CraftARError error)
        Callback from the CraftARSDK.singleShotSearch() call, when the picture could not be taken.
        Parameters:
        error - Error describing the problem.

      • onPreviewFrame

        void onPreviewFrame(CraftARQueryImage image)
        Receives a frame from the camera.
        Parameters:
        image - The frame from the camera

      • onFinderActivated

        void onFinderActivated()
        Notify that CraftARGenericSDK.startFinder() was called.

      • onFinderDeactivated

        void onFinderDeactivated()
        Notify that CraftARGenericSDK.stopFinder() was called.
